amendment.description: Amendment provides for a limitation on the use of funds for warrantless searches of government databases for information pertaining to U.S. citizens.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to provide for a limitation on the use of funds for Section 702 programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Massie amendment (A063) Agreed to by recorded vote: 255 - 174 (Roll no. 356).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Massie amendment (A063) Agreed to by recorded vote: 255 - 174 (Roll no. 356).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A063) offered by Mr. Massie.
